results.title: Supervising for Service
results.creator_credit: Peter Quarry, Eve Ash and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “The Improving Service”.
Supervisors need to support frontline staff in serving customers by providing on-going training, being available when problems arise, motivating staff and improving poor individual service performance.

results.title: Le 5eme Dessous
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
The children are taken by force by Lulu and led underneath the Opera House. Lulu demands to be taken to the props department and the jewels. The Police is searching the whole House.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Suru = The Herd
results.creator_credit: Zeki Okten, Yilmaz Guney and Guney Film
results.brief_description:
A nomadic herdsman who has married a woman from a tribe with which his family has an ancient feud, takes a flock of sheep to sell in Ankara. On the way, some sheep die and others are stolen, and in the big city, the man is paid much less by a dealer than he was promised. Finally, his wife dies. Without preaching or sentimentality, the film exposes the hardships and injustices of Turkish society. Like ‘The Enemy’ and ‘Yol’, this film was supervised by Yilmaz Gueney from prison.

Credits: Producer, writer, Yilmaz Gueney ; director, Zeki Okten ; photography, Izzet Akay ; music, Zulfu Livaneli.
Cast: Tarik Akan, Melike Demirag, Tuncel Kurtiz, Levent Inanir, Meral Niron.

results.title: La Substitution
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
A famous collection of jewels dubbed ‘Le Tresor des Hollandais’ is stolen between Asterdam and London. The jewels are now in possession of Morales, a night club owner in Paris. He employs Stephane, a young ballet dancer whose career has been shattered by injury. Stephane still has his entries at the Paris Opera House and Ballet School where his younger brother Bicou is also studying to be a dancer. Morales is using Stephane to subtitute the real jewels to the fake one worn by a mannequin used in the performances of the ballet ‘Coppelia’. The company is on the eve of a tour of Canada and Coppelia is to be used to smuggle the precious stones into the country. But on the night of the substitution nothing goes according to plan.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Service Burnout
results.creator_credit: Peter Quarry, Eve Ash and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “The Improving Service”.
Service burnout is a stress reaction suffered by frontline and service staff. Addresses physical and emotional symptoms, effects on customer service, prevention of burnout and how to remedy existing cases of burnout.

results.title: La Fille Aux Yeux D'email
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
Stephane is still trying to operate the subitution of jewels in spite of the constant interruptions of Bicou and his best friend Jacinthe. He hopes to be out of the Opera House just in time to reach ‘L’oiseau de feu’, the cabaret owned by Morales wher he performs his dance number with Gloria. Instead, he finds himself locked up on the roof of the Opera House.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Dernier Carat
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
In order to save her name and Stephane’s, Olympe negotiates the return of the jewels against immunity from prosecution. Boudot organises a television link-up between Paris and Montreal to close the investigation.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: C'est Parti!
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
Stephane receives orders from Morales to substitute the jewels back on arrival in Montreal. To convince him to obey orders, Morales reminds him that Olympe is now a de facto accomplice since she is the one who cleared the jewels through customs. In Paris, Bicou and Jacinthe are in possession of a necklace without knowing that it is part of the treasure. Lulu is trying is hardest to recover them from the children.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Unhappy Customers
results.creator_credit: Peter Quarry, Eve Ash and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “The Improving Service”.
Unhappy customers promptly tell others about poor service. Offers the philosophy that complaints should be welcomed so that the problem can be resolved, repeat business generated and the now satisfied customer will tell others. Illustrates a step by step method in a range of service settings.
